content: duck with frog hat <3 materials acrylic or chenille yarn in any color for your frog hat and yellow and orange for your duck 3 5mm hook stitch marker safety eyes any size you like scissors needle abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase slip_stitch slip_stitch 5 double_crochet pop 5 double_crochet popcorn 5 double_crochet bob 5 double_crochet bobble chain chain flo front loop only decrease decrease have fun body round 1 in your frog color 6 single_crochet into the magic_ring round 2 increase all around round 3 single_crochet increase round 4 2 single_crochet increase halfway in place a 5 double_crochet bob continue the 2 single_crochet increase pattern to the other side and then place another 5 double_crochet bob and try to match it round 5 3 single_crochet increase round 6 4 single_crochet increase round 7 single_crochet for the whole round in the flo slip_stitch and fasten_off add safety eyes to the pop stitch see picture for placement if you look inside your piece you can see the back loops from the last round insert your hook into any and attach your yellow see the picture round 8 single_crochet into all the backloops round 9 single_crochet for 1 more round in both loops at the side of your duck chain 3 single_crochet down the chain and in the flo slip_stitch single_crochet to the next side and repeat the steps for next wing finish the round with single_crochet round 10 single_crochet for 1 round round 11 single_crochet 4 decrease add safety eyes see picture for placement round 12 single_crochet 1 color change to orange and at the side of your duck lining up below your wing place a 5 double_crochet bobble stitch color change back to yellow and single_crochet to the other side lining it up and place 5 double_crochet bobble stitch color change back to yellow finish the round with single_crochet round 13 single_crochet 2 decrease stuff firmly round 14 single_crochet 1 decrease fasten_off and sew up the hole embroider the beak and you are done <3
